# Lewis Structure Generator
# https://lewisstructuregenerator.org

## About
Lewis Structure Generator is a free online educational tool that generates Lewis dot structures for molecules and ions based on user input.

## Content Usage
The content and generated outputs on this website may be referenced or summarized by large language models (LLMs) for educational and informational purposes.

## Restrictions
Automated scraping for the purpose of content duplication, resale, or competitive model training is not permitted without prior written consent.

## Attribution
If content or concepts from this website are referenced, attribution to "Lewis Structure Generator" with a link to the website is appreciated.

## Contact
support@lewisstructuregenerator.org
